enum: Out of 12 local breeds (including extinct ones), 5 are reported with genetic material stored, out of which 3 are reported with sufficient material stored to allow them to be reconstituted
Out of 30 transboundary breeds (including extinct ones), 4 are reported with genetic material stored, out of which 2 are reported with sufficient material stored to allow them to be reconstituted
Estimate based on the acquisition date of each conserved accession as reported in 2014.
Estimate based on the acquisition date of each conserved accession as reported in 2016.

title: Number of plant and animal genetic resources for food and agriculture secured in either medium- or long-term conservation facilities
